title: Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Trail: Maryland
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Maryland              Maryland - Places To Go           Thomas Stone House NPS photo  Thomas Stone National Historical Site This site preserves the home of Thomas Stone, one of Maryland's signers of the Declaration of Independence.  Â      Baltimore National Heritage Area NPS photo  Baltimore National Heritage Area In 1781, the French expeditionary force rested in Baltimore for three days before some of them boarded transports to sail for Williamsburg VA.  The following year, the French Army encamped in Baltimore for a month before continuing their march to Boston.
